example: The dog barked loudly when someone approached the gate.
example_fr: Le chien a aboyé fort quand quelqu'un s'est approché du portail.

example: The cat slept quietly on the windowsill all afternoon.
example_fr: Le chat a dormi tranquillement sur le rebord de la fenêtre tout l'après-midi.

example: Their house was painted last summer and now looks brand new.
example_fr: Leur maison a été repeinte l'été dernier et paraît maintenant neuve.

example: His car broke down on the way to work this morning.
example_fr: Sa voiture est tombée en panne en allant au travail ce matin.

example: She drank a glass of cold water after her run.
example_fr: Elle a bu un verre d'eau froide après sa course.

example: They bought fresh bread from the bakery every morning.
example_fr: Ils achetaient du pain frais à la boulangerie chaque matin.

example: A tall tree stood in the middle of the garden.
example_fr: Un grand arbre se trouvait au milieu du jardin.

example: He found the book he had been looking for at the library.
example_fr: Il a trouvé le livre qu'il cherchait à la bibliothèque.

example: The chair was so comfortable that she didn't want to get up.
example_fr: La chaise était si confortable qu'elle ne voulait plus se lever.

example: They set the table for dinner before their guests arrived.
example_fr: Ils ont dressé la table pour le dîner avant l'arrivée de leurs invités.

example: She opened the window to let in some fresh air.
example_fr: Elle a ouvert la fenêtre pour laisser entrer un peu d'air frais.

example: Someone knocked on the door, but nobody was expecting visitors.
example_fr: Quelqu'un a frappé à la porte, mais personne n'attendait de visiteurs.

example: The street was empty early in the morning.
example_fr: La rue était déserte tôt le matin.

example: The city is known for its beautiful historic buildings.
example_fr: La ville est connue pour ses beaux bâtiments historiques.

example: The sun was shining brightly over the lake.
example_fr: Le soleil brillait intensément au-dessus du lac.

example: A full moon lit up the sky last night.
example_fr: Une pleine lune éclairait le ciel la nuit dernière.

example: The child laughed while playing with a red ball.
example_fr: L'enfant riait en jouant avec une balle rouge.

example: His mother cooked his favorite meal for dinner.
example_fr: Sa mère a préparé son plat préféré pour le dîner.

example: Her father picked her up from school every day.
example_fr: Son père venait la chercher à l'école chaque jour.

example: The food smelled delicious when it was brought to the table.
example_fr: La nourriture sentait délicieusement bon lorsqu'on l'a apportée à table.

example: They shared a fresh watermelon during the picnic.
example_fr: Ils ont partagé une pastèque fraîche pendant le pique-nique.

example: He ate an apple before leaving the house.
example_fr: Il a mangé une pomme avant de quitter la maison.

example: She put a banana in her bag as a quick snack.
example_fr: Elle a mis une banane dans son sac comme encas rapide.

example: He bought a bottle of milk on his way home.
example_fr: Il a acheté une bouteille de lait sur le chemin du retour.

example: She added cheese to the pasta to make it tastier.
example_fr: Elle a ajouté du fromage aux pâtes pour les rendre plus savoureuses.

example: He spread butter on a slice of warm bread.
example_fr: Il a étalé du beurre sur une tranche de pain chaud.

example: She added a little salt to improve the flavor.
example_fr: Elle a ajouté un peu de sel pour améliorer le goût.

example: He prefers tea without sugar in the morning.
example_fr: Il préfère le thé sans sucre le matin.

example: She drank a cup of hot coffee before leaving.

example: He made himself a cup of tea to relax.

example: The school was closed due to heavy snow.

example: Each student received a new workbook.

example: She always keeps a notebook in her bag to jot down ideas.

example_fr: Il a oublié son sac dans le bus hier.

example: His friend helped him move into his new apartment.

example: She found a new job in the city center.

example: He has to work late tonight.

example: She felt happy after receiving the good news.

example: She felt hungry before dinner.

example: He wrote a short message before leaving.

example: The garden looked beautiful in spring.

example: He thought the painting was ugly, but she loved it.

example: The train was so fast that they arrived early.

example: The internet connection was slow all day.

example: The young boy helped his grandmother carry groceries.

example: This restaurant is known for its good food.
